title: The OnePlus Watch 2 is $100 Cheaper with this Black Friday Offer
description: It's got a terrific battery and solid performance. The post The OnePlus Watch 2 is $100 Cheaper with this Black Friday Offer appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It's got a terrific battery and solid performance.
text: OnePlus’ return to the smart wearable arena was a triumphant one to say the least – the OnePlus Watch 2 improves on its predecessor in every single way, and packs a lot of much-welcome upgrades, making for one very premium smartwatch. It’s on sale right now, with up to $100 off thanks to this Black Friday deal. In terms of specs, the OnePlus Watch 2 comes with a 1.43-inch AMOLED touch screen, IP68 dust and water protection, a powerful Snapdragon W5 chip, 2GB of RAM and 32GB ROM, as well as an attractive-looking stainless steel design in addition to a sapphire glass display, which should keep it safe from most scuffs and scratches. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
